Class MenuButton

ImageComponent
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.screens.MenuButton
public class MenuButton extends ImageComponent
A scalable animated menu button used on the main menu screen. The button adjusts its size based on window resolution, updates its font dynamically, and plays a hover animation with sounds.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MenuButton(double x, double y, double width, double height, String text)
    Creates a new menu button with the specified position, size, and displayed text.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BufferedImage
    getImage()
    Returns the current button image, scaled to the correct size for the window resolution.
    void
    update()
    Updates the button animation state.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuButton

      public MenuButton(double x, double y, double width, double height, String text)
      Creates a new menu button with the specified position, size, and displayed text. Automatically attaches to the game loop.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the button
      y - the y-coordinate of the button
      width - initial width (later overridden by scaling)
      height - initial height (later overridden by scaling)
      text - button label

  • Method Details

    • getImage

      public BufferedImage getImage()
      Returns the current button image, scaled to the correct size for the window resolution. Also updates font scaling and selects the correct animation frame based on hover state.
      Returns:
      the scaled button sprite for the current frame

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the button animation state. Handles hover detection, hover-sound playback, and advancing animation frames while throttling speed for smooth visual transitions.
